summary: In 1867, a family from the East, despite some initial hesitations, decides to try its luck by settling in the harsh and dangerous West.
cast: Joanna Pettet|William Shatner|David Janssen|Lance LeGault|Helen Hunt|Russell Baer|Linda Kupecek|Lloyd Berry|John Scott Martin|Robert Koons|Agatha Mercer|Les Kimber|John Murrell|Frank Edge|Una Pulson
title: Pioneer Woman
